remarks: Lemma for ~ paddass .  Restate projective space axiom ~ ps-2 . (Contributed by NM, 8-Jan-2012.)
statement:
paddasslem.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
paddasslem.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
paddasslem.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
paddasslem3 $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ ( x e. A /\ r e. A /\ y e. A ) /\ ( p e. A /\ z e. A ) ) -> ( ( ( -. x .<_ ( r .\/ y ) /\ p =/= z ) /\ ( p .<_ ( x .\/ r ) /\ z .<_ ( r .\/ y ) ) ) -> E. s e. A ( s .<_ ( x .\/ y ) /\ s .<_ ( p .\/ z ) ) ) ) $.
$d .<_ s $.
$d .\/ s $.
$d A s $.
$d K s $.
$d p s $.
$d r s $.
$d s x $.
$d s y $.
$d s z $.
